      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context context)
                       throws com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidTypeException,
                              com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException,
                              java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Initializes EaSQLite by setting up a database handler with a context from the Application. It will initialize all tables already in local storage.
        Parameters:
        context - the context provided by the Application.
        Throws:
        com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidTypeException
        com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • createTable

        public static boolean createTable(java.lang.String tableName)
                           throws com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException
        Creates a table with the specified tableName having no columns nor rows initially.
        Parameters:
        tableName - name the new table will have.
        Returns:
        boolean flag indicating the success of table creation.
        Throws:
        com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException

      • createTable

        public boolean createTable(java.lang.String tableName,
                           android.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>[] columnList)
                    throws com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException
        Creates a table given a table name and a list of Pairs holding column names and column types. Types can be any of the following: "INTEGER", "TEXT", "REAL", "BLOB".
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table to create.
        columnList - the list of pairs where each Pair holds the name, type of the column.
        Returns:
        boolean flag indicating the success of table creation.
        Throws:
        com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException

      • deleteTable

        public static boolean deleteTable(java.lang.String tableName)
        Deletes a table given a table name, if the table currently exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table to be deleted.
        Returns:
        a boolean flag indicating the success of table deletion. Will return false if the table does not currently exist in the DB.

      • getTableNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTableNames()
        Retrieves all the table names currently stored in the DB.
        Returns:
        a List of Strings representing the table names in the DB.

      • tableToString

        public static java.lang.String tableToString(java.lang.String tableName)
        Gives a String representation of a table specified by a passed in table name. Format will be list of entries separated by commas with a newline at the end.
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of the table to give String representation.
        Returns:
        String representation of the table.

      • changeTableName

        public static boolean changeTableName(java.lang.String currentName,
                                      java.lang.String newName)
                               throws com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException
        Changes the table name of a certain table from currentName to newName.
        Parameters:
        currentName - the current name of the table used to find the table.
        newName - the name that the table will change to.
        Returns:
        a boolean flag indicating the success of the change. Will return false if a table with currentName cannot be found.
        Throws:
        com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException

      • getNumColumns

        public static int getNumColumns(java.lang.String tableName)
        Returns the number of columns in a table specified by the table name. -1 if table not found.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table used to identify the table to quantify columns.
        Returns:
        the number of columns of the specified table.

      • getNumRows

        public static int getNumRows(java.lang.String tableName)
        Returns the number of rows in a table specified by the table name. -1 if table not found.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table used to identify the table to quantify rows.
        Returns:
        the number of columns of the specified table.

      • addColumn

        public static boolean addColumn(java.lang.String tableName,
                                java.lang.String columnName,
                                java.lang.String type)
                         throws com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidTypeException,
                                com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException
        Adds a single column to the table specified by a table name. The column should have a specified column name and type.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the table name used to identify the table to add the column to.
        columnName - the name of the column to be added.
        type - the type of the column to be added. The type can be: "INTEGER", "TEXT", or "REAL."
        Returns:
        a boolean flag indicating success of the addition.
        Throws:
        com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidTypeException
        com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException

      • addColumns

        public static boolean addColumns(java.lang.String tableName,
                                 android.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>[] columns)
                          throws com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidTypeException,
                                 com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException
        Adds multiple columns to the table specified by an array of Pairs with the first entry being a column name, and second entry being the type.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the table name used to identify the table to add columns to.
        columns - an array of Pairs that hold column names and column types.
        Returns:
        a boolean flag indicating success of the additions.
        Throws:
        com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidTypeException
        com.mdb.easqlitelib.exceptions.InvalidInputException

      • getColumn

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getColumn(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                         java.lang.String columnName)
        Retrieves a column with a specified column name from a table specified by a certain table name. The column is represented by a list of Objects.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the table name used to identify the table to get the column from.
        columnName - the column name used to identify the column to return.
        Returns:
        a List of objects representing a column in the Table.

      • getColumnNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getColumnNames(java.lang.String tableName)
        Gets an in-order List of column names in order from a table
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table to retrieve from
        Returns:
        a List of strings of the column names in the table, in order

      • addRow

        public static int addRow(java.lang.String tableName,
                         android.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>[] entries)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a new entry to a table, with an array of column names to entry value
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table to be added to
        entries - the array of Pairs, formatted such that first is the column name and second is the entry value for that column
        Returns:
        id of entry as integer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • deleteRow

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Object> deleteRow(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                         int id)
        Deletes an entry from a table with id, returns the values of entry
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of the table from which the entry is removed
        id - id of the entry, given by the addRow method
        Returns:
        List with values of entry in order

      • deleteAllRows

        public static boolean deleteAllRows(java.lang.String tableName)
        Deletes all entries in a table
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of table to delete all entries from
        Returns:
        success of deletion

      • getRowById

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getRowById(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                          int id)
        Retrieves the values of an entry from a table with values in order
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table to retrieve entry from
        id - the id of the entry to retrieve, given by the addRow method
        Returns:
        a List of objects which are the values of the entry in order
